description:
Tamagoneko is a 2D platformer that's both charming and tough as nails, designed for fans of "kaizo" games.

Play as a nimble white cat navigating through saws, pits, and spikes to rescue lost kitten eggs. In each new world, your cat will learn new moves to overcome even more difficult obstacles.

Features:
- 160 Unique Hand-crafted Levels: Explore 7 worlds with distinct designs and mechanics.
- Large skill set: Run, jump, climb, and learn new moves in every world.
- Cat Customization: Unlock skins and unique effects.
- Speedrunner-Friendly: Record individual and total times.
- Hidden Secrets: Collect hidden fruits to reveal even more difficult challenges.
name: Tamagoneko
